description.translate: Where there's smoke there's fire. As does loot for chest.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§9Patte de la brume\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Il n'y a pas de fumée sans feu.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Ni de coffre sans butin.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Where there's smoke there's fire.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7As does loot for chest.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7LUC§a1 §7HAS§c-1\"}"]}}
